duties_responsibilities.duty: Forge trusted relationships with customers of different cross functions managing multiple programs.
Maintain Master Project Plan, including project timing of all multiple programs, dependencies, risks, and challenges.
Communicate with high-level stakeholders of customers and track weekly status of multiple programs.
Interact with Core Team through scheduled meetings, develop 1-1 rapport with them.
Work with ServiceNow architects, stakeholders to solve stalemates, drive for resolutions of Key Business Decisions, assist OCM in driving changes, and understand & manage Risks/ issues.
Prepare contents/PowerPoint decks for SteerCo and OpCO meetings, and for different meetings with Core teams/problem-solving meetings.
Review content of weekly status update with Program Owner and communicate the status of development/product completion to all stakeholders.
Follow-up with responsible team for mitigating Risks/resolving issues/Actions and developing Minutes of Meeting, action points after all key meetings.
Interact with engineering team regularly to understand updates/progress and provide inputs.
Create weekly status update as per template and produce high-quality deliverables as both an individual contributor and a part of the team.
Collaborate with other teams across functions to identify new ways to bring value to clients.
Understand Entitlements/Licensing/Pricing business process and experience in managing transformation projects in Pricing, Entitlement, Sales in a software company will be an added advantage.
Possess good articulation & presentation skills to a diverse audience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
